page.title: 08MUSEUM
page.content: This private collection was started some twenty years ago by{Stewart {Collis.}He has added to it _ largely farm tractors and implements. He has about fifty tractors dating from{1918, the oldest one was used for docking the{Isle of Wight _ Gosport}ferry and was driven by coal gas.It was in use until the conversion to North Sea gas. He has a collection of old cartwheels,a{1927}Morris commercial vehicle and a penny farthing bicycle. These items are housed in the various sheds around the farm house.There is also a two storey barn crammed with a varied collection of household articles,mostly from the{Victorian era. There is a collection of pieces of {Roman}pottery and{Celtic}flint artifacts found on the farm.
